about_the_game:
Welcome to Embervale, the ultimate idle fantasy RPG on Twitch and Steam! Dive into a magical world, strive to be the strongest player, and uncover unique treasures. Thrive in Adventures, where your strategic decisions with streamers and viewers determine your success and lead to victory!

Embark on thrilling adventures alongside your favorite streamers and experience the thrill of victory and the agony of defeat! Whether you're a seasoned gamer or new to the world of role play games, Embervale is the perfect way to dive into the action and join a community of passionate players who share your love for gaming. So why wait? Join the adventure and start your journey to become the ultimate player in Embervale today!

Why Choose the Steam Version of Embervale?

The Steam version of Embervale offers the most reliable and optimized gaming experience. With all graphical assets included directly in the game, you can enjoy significantly reduced loading times. This ensures that even players with slower internet connections can dive into the adventure seamlessly.

Streamers will particularly benefit from using the Steam version when playing Adventure mode with their viewers, as it provides the best and smoothest experience possible.

Rest assured, the Steam version contains the same rich content and exciting features as the Twitch extension and web versions. Plus, you can showcase your Embervale achievements on your Steam profile, adding an extra layer of bragging rights to your gaming accomplishments.

Can I Play Without a Twitch Account?

When you start Embervale, you'll have the option to create an account through Steam or link your existing Twitch account to your Steam profile. This flexibility ensures you can jump into the game whether you’re using Twitch or not.

However, for Twitch streamers, there's an exclusive Adventure Mode. To access this feature, you'll need to either log in with your Twitch account or link your Steam account to Twitch. This mode is designed to enhance the interactive experience for streamers and their communities!

Achievements

Once you link your account to Steam, all your achievements will be synchronized across platforms. No matter where you play, any unlocked achievements will automatically appear on your Steam profile. This seamless integration ensures your accomplishments are always up-to-date and ready to show off!
